table.name: vtiger_payment
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_payment` (`paymentid` int(11) NOT NULL, `paymentno` varchar(100) default NULL, `payment_tks_paymenttype` varchar(100) default NULL ,`payment_tks_paiddate` date default NULL ,`payment_tks_bankname` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_paymentno` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_paymenttotal` decimal(21,5) default NULL ,`payment_tks_description` varchar(250) default NULL ,`payment_tks_termscondition` varchar(250) default NULL ,`payment_tks_billingaddress` varchar(250) default NULL ,`payment_tks_billingcity` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_billingstate` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_billingpostalcode` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_contactname` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_invoiceno` varchar(32) default NULL ,`payment_tks_paymentstatus` varchar(100) default NULL ,`payment_tks_paymentdate` date default NULL ,`payment_tks_review` varchar(250) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`paymentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_paymentcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_paymentcf` (`paymentid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`paymentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_payment_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_payment_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_payment_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
